mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CNotice (CNoticeNum, Title, Contents_C, RecDate, Author, AuthorNick) values ( COMMISIONNOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{Title}, #{Contents, jdbcType=CLOB, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.ClobTypeHandler}, #{RecDate}, #{Author}, #{AuthorNick} )
mapper.update: Update CNotice SET Hits = Hits + 1 WHERE CNoticeNum = #{CNoticeNum}
mapper.select: SELECT CNoticeNum, Title, Contents_C, RecDate, Author, AuthorNick, Hits FROM CNotice WHERE CNoticeNum = #{CNoticeNum}
SELECT CNoticeNum, Title, RecDate, Author, AuthorNick, Hits FROM CNotice order by CNoticeNum DESC
